name: Zapatillas de mujer New Balance Clay 996v3 Tenis
description: Las zapatillas de tenis New Balance Clay 996v3 fueron diseñadas especialmente para canchas de polvo de ladrillo, con una suela Ndurance que brinda buen agarre y una tracción duradera.

name: Cali Sport Wildcats Women's Sneakers
description: Synthetic leather and suede upper with furry animal-printed panels. Full lace closure. Platform rubber midsole design with textured tooling. Rubber outsole provides durable traction and grip PUMA Formstrip overlay at side Gold metallic PUMA label at tongue
